com.joffrey_bion.compression

Class Compressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joffrey_bion.compression.Compressor

  • public class Compressor
extends Object
    Provides the compression and decompression methods to manipulate the files given in the constructor.
    Author:
    Joffrey Bion

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Compressor() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void compress(String sourceName, String destName)
      Compresses the given source file into the destination file
      static void uncompress(String sourceName, String destName)
      Uncompresses the given source file into the destination file

    • Method Detail

      • compress

        public static void compress(String sourceName,
            String destName)
        Compresses the given source file into the destination file
        Parameters:
        sourceName - The relative path to a text file to compress.
        destName - The relative path to the destination binary file to be created or overwritten.

      • uncompress

        public static void uncompress(String sourceName,
              String destName)
        Uncompresses the given source file into the destination file
        Parameters:
        sourceName - The relative path to a binary file previously produced by compress(String, String).
        destName - The relative path to the destination text file to be created or overwritten.
